ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Ulysses Cosmic Ray and Solar Particle Investigation (COSPIN) High Energy Telescope (HET) Full Resolution Housekeeping Parameters, 256 s Data

RevisionEvent.Note: Only known prior ReleaseDate of the metadata

Added PublicationInfo. Added ResourceType and NamingAuthority. Changed http to https in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Fixed version number separator in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Matched version number in schemaLocation attribute to updated value in Version tag. ZCB

ResourceHeader.Description: A Directory containing Daily FTP downloadable Files containing Readout-by-Readout Listings of HET Housekeeping Parameters (Voltages, Temperatures, Offsets). The Naming Convention of the Files is uly_het_full_house_YYYDDD.txt, where YYY indicates the three digit Year since 1900 (e.g. YYY=090 for 1990, and YYY=102 for 2002) and DDD indicates the three digit Day of Year (January 1 = 1). In each File, following a detailed Description of the Format, the Data consist of a Listing of HET Housekeeping Parameters measured at the Time listed in the first four Columns of each Line. Each Line contains Data for one Readout of the Parameters. The first four Columns give the Time of the Measurement as Fractional Year (to 12 Decimal Places) and as Year since 1900, Day of Year, and Milliseconds of Day. At the most common Science Telemetry Rate, 2048 bps, each Parameter in this File is Readout once every 256 s. The Measurements are instantaneous, and do not represent an Average of Values over the Interval since the last Readout. The sole Function of these Parameters is to monitor Instrument Health. No Noise Removal or Despiking has been done, so Caution must be used in interpreting isolated large Increases or Decreases in the measured Parameters.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the COSPIN HET Lead Investigator and COSPIN PI, R. Bruce McKibben

PublicationInfo.PublishedBy: Planetary Data System; Space Physics Data Facility; European Space Astronomy Centre

InformationURL.Name: The Ulysses Cosmic Ray and Solar Particle Investigation, COSPIN
InformationURL.Description: Published Description of the COSPIN Instrumentation, J.A. Simpson et al., Astron. Astrophys. Suppl. Ser. 92, 365-399, 1992. See especially Section 4.3 for a detailed Description of the High Energy Telescopes, HET. An electronic Copy of this Paper is available at http://adsbit.harvard.edu/cgi-bin/nph-iarticle_query?1992A%26AS...92..365S&defaultprint=YES&filetype=.pdf.

InformationURL.Name: User Notes for the COSPIN/HET Data Files
InformationURL.Description: The User Notes File at the Ulysses Final Archive (UFA) describes the Format of the ASCII Data Files for the COSPIN High Energy Telescope, HET

InformationURL.Name: COSPIN HET Full Resolution ReadMe Document, Word Format
InformationURL.Description: Top Level Descriptions of Formats and Contents of the six File Types that make up the COSPIN HET Full Resolution Data Set. Detailed Descriptions of the Formats and Contents are found in Header Lines at the Start of each downloaded Data File. The Data covered by this SPASE Description are described in the ReadMe under the Heading House. (*** Note ***: During the Build-up of this Data Set, a few Errors and Omissions have been found in the Header Lines for some of the File Types. These Errors and Omissions are listed in this ReadMe File. Upon Completion of the Data Set, all Errors and Omissions discovered will be corrected in all of the Header Lines of all of the File Types at which time this Note will be removed).

AccessURL.Name: Ulysses Final Archive Access to COSPIN/HET Full Resolution Housekeeping Parameters
AccessURL.Description: Parent Directory containing FTP downloadable Daily Files with the Format described below

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge R. Bruce McKibben, Space Science Center, University of New Hampshire

Parameter.Name: Time of Measurement
Parameter.Description: Time at which the Measurements were made

Parameter.Name: ADC Offset
Parameter.Description: Offset of Analogue to Digital Converter Base from Zero Volts
Parameter.Caveats: During In-Flight-Calibrate Sequences, the ADC Offset Measurement is disabled and is replaced in the Telemetry by the +15 V Monitor Measurement. During these Times, the ADC Offset Measurement in this Listing is replaced by fill.

Parameter.Name: COSPIN/HET +15 V Monitor
Parameter.Description: Measurement of the Voltage on the +15 V regulated Power Line from the COSPIN Converter.
Parameter.Caveats: This Measurement is reported only during In-Flight-Calibrate Sequences. At all other Times it is represented in this Listing by fill.

Parameter.Name: COSPIN/HET +10 V Monitor
Parameter.Description: Measurement of the Voltage on the +10 V Line from the COSPIN Converter.

Parameter.Name: COSPIN/HET -6 V Monitor
Parameter.Description: Measurement of the Voltage on the -6 V Line from the COSPIN Converter.

Parameter.Name: COSPIN/HET -15 V Monitor
Parameter.Description: Measurement of the Voltage on the -15 V Line from the COSPIN Converter.

Parameter.Name: COSPIN/HET PMT Voltage
Parameter.Description: Operating Voltage of the PMT viewing the HET Anti-Coincidence Cylinder.

Parameter.Name: COSPIN/HET K1 Voltage
Parameter.Description: Bias Voltage for Detectors KX,KY,KZ (DX,DY,DZ). Documentation available in 2009 does not make clear whether the Detectors were K1,K2,K3 (D7,D8,D9) or K4,K5,K6 (D10,D11,D12).

Parameter.Name: COSPIN/HET K2 Voltage
Parameter.Description: Bias Voltage for Detectors KA,KB,KC (DA,DB,DC). Documentation available in 2009 does not make clear whether the Detectors were K1,K2,K3 (D7,D8,D9) or K4,K5,K6 (D10,D11,D12).
